attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS IS A PETITION TO TELL THE GOVERNMENT WE HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF ALL THESE TAXES IMPOSED UPON OUR HARD WORKING CITIZENS OF ENGLAND. WE WHO WORK HAVE A RIGHT TO ENJOY WHAT WE EARN.INSTEAD EVERY PENNY EXTRA IS TAKEN OFF US BY THE TAX MAN.I THINK ITS ABOUT TIME WE STOOD UP FOR OURSELVES AND SAY ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.THE JOKE IS WE ARE PAYING ALL THESE TAXES AND BY THE TIME WE RETIRE THERE WILL BE NOTHING LEFT FOR US.WHILE THE MPS ARE LINING THERE POCKETS WITH OUR HARD EARNED CASH AND LIVING IT UP. WE ARE WORKING OUR BUTTS OFF TO PAY FOR THE THEIR MISTAKES AND MISJUDGEMENTS. WE HAVE A RIGHT TO ENJOY OUR HARD EARNED CASH.STOP GIVING PEOPLE MONEY HANDOUTS FOR NOT WORKING AND PENALIZING HARD WORKING CITIZENS TO PAY FOR IT. LET THE GOVERNMENT GIVE IT TO THEM OUT OF THIER OWN POCKETS INSTEAD OF GIVING THIERSELVES BIG FAT WAGE PACKETS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
